ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_olc | |- ( ch -> ( ph \/ ch ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_olc | |- ( ch -> ( ps \/ ch ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_jca | |- ( ch -> ( ( ph \/ ch ) /\ ( ps \/ ch ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_biantrud | |- ( ch -> ( ( ph \/ ps ) <-> ( ( ph \/ ps ) /\ ( ( ph \/ ch ) /\ ( ps \/ ch ) ) ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cadan | |- ( cadd ( ph , ps , ch ) <-> ( ( ph \/ ps ) /\ ( ph \/ ch ) /\ ( ps \/ ch ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( ( ph \/ ps ) /\ ( ph \/ ch ) /\ ( ps \/ ch ) ) <-> ( ( ph \/ ps ) /\ ( ( ph \/ ch ) /\ ( ps \/ ch ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_bitri | |- ( cadd ( ph , ps , ch ) <-> ( ( ph \/ ps ) /\ ( ( ph \/ ch ) /\ ( ps \/ ch ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl6rbbr | |- ( ch -> ( cadd ( ph , ps , ch ) <-> ( ph \/ ps ) ) ) |
